title: One Piece Episode #574 Anime Review
author: The Fandom Post
description: A detailed review of Episode 574 describing it as a transitional episode that is light, fun, silly and still has an edge of danger. The review praises the callback to Laboon and notes how the episode hits all the right notes for long-time viewers.

title: The One Piece Podcast - Episode 245: We Are The Champions
author: The One Piece Podcast
description: The One Piece Podcast discusses Episode 574 in their anime recap segment (timestamp 0:37:01 to 0:56:43). They cover the crew's entrance into the New World and the Island Whale encounter.

title: 573-574: 'Finally Time to Go! Goodbye, Fish-Man Island!' and 'To the New World! Heading for the Ultimate Sea!'
author: Never Watched One Piece
description: A blog post analyzing episodes 573-574 from the perspective of someone watching One Piece for the first time. Discusses the transition from Fish-Man Island to the New World.

title: One Piece: Fishman Island (517-574) - Episode 574: To the New World! Heading for the Ultimate Sea!
author: Crunchyroll
description: Official streaming of Episode 574 on Crunchyroll with both subtitled and English dubbed versions available.

title: One Piece Episode 574
author: TGL Reacts
description: Reaction video to One Piece Episode 574 by TGL Reacts (Patreon exclusive content).

title: One Piece – Fishman Island Arc (Episodes 554–574) Review
author: Hogan Reviews
description: A comprehensive review of the entire Fishman Island Arc, including Episode 574 as the arc's conclusion.
